title: 'No opportunity gap in AI, only execution risk': Infosys chairman Nandan Nilekani

description: India needs to start measuring how much artificial intelligence it creates, not just how many data centres it builds or how much AI it consumes, Raj Koneru, founder and CEO of Kore.ai, said on Tuesday.
